participant_1.background:
I have been exposed to a variety of cultures and lifestyles due to my upbringing.
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.
my sister is my best friend.
I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.
I enjoy creating and sharing art with others to help them learn about animal welfare issues.

participant_2.background:
I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again.
I have been working at my current job for three years, but my heart is still in the outdoors.
my husband is a pastor.
I love my leather clothes because they make me feel confident and powerful.
i hate flowers.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going well, thanks! I'm really excited for the weekend. I'm going to be riding my horses.
That's so cool! I used to ride horses when I was younger, but I haven't had the chance to in a while.
You should totally get back into it! It's so much fun.
I might just do that! Where do you ride your horses?
I have a small farm in the country.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to live in the country.
It's definitely the best!
I'm sure your husband loves it too.
He does! He's a pastor and loves being outdoors.
That's so great! I love hearing about people who are passionate about their work.
Me too! I'm really lucky to have such a great husband.
I'm sure you are!
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to create art and share it with others. I also love animals.
That's so cool! I love animals too. What kind of art do you create?
I mostly create paintings and drawings. I also love to write stories.
That's amazing! I love to read and write too.
That's great! We should totally get together sometime and create some art.
That would be so much fun!
